experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer at Google
experiences.description: As a Senior Software Engineer at Google, I played a pivotal role in developing innovative solutions for Google's core search algorithms. Collaborating with a dynamic team of engineers, I contributed to the enhancement of search accuracy and efficiency, optimizing user experiences for millions of users worldwide.

experiences.title: Software Engineer at Youtube
experiences.description: At Youtube, I served as a Software Engineer, focusing on the design and implementation of backend systems for the social media giant's dynamic platform. Working on projects that involved large-scale data processing and user engagement features, I leveraged my expertise to ensure seamless functionality and scalability.

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer at Apple
experiences.description: During my tenure at Apple, I held the role of Software Architect, where I played a key role in shaping the architecture of mission-critical software projects. Responsible for designing scalable and efficient systems, I provided technical leadership to a cross-functional team.

projects.title: Crypto Screener Application
projects.description: A real-time cryptocurrency tracking application that helps users monitor market trends and set price alerts for their favorite coins.
projects.fullDescription: This comprehensive cryptocurrency tracking platform provides real-time market data, price alerts, and advanced charting capabilities. Built with modern web technologies, it offers a seamless user experience for crypto enthusiasts and traders.

projects.title: E-commerce Website Template
projects.description: A modern, responsive e-commerce template built with Next.js and TailwindCSS, featuring a shopping cart, product filtering, and checkout process.
projects.fullDescription: A fully responsive e-commerce platform with advanced product filtering, secure checkout, and a clean, modern design. Includes features like product recommendations, user authentication, and responsive mobile layout.

projects.title: Blog Website Template
projects.description: A minimalist blog template with dark mode support, markdown content, and a custom CMS integration.
projects.fullDescription: A sleek, performance-optimized blog platform with built-in dark mode, markdown support, and a headless CMS integration. Features include SEO optimization, responsive design, and easy content management.
